direction.raw_text: You live in my country. Can't speak my language... Too bad the one guy on my team that could speak English got murdered today. Yuri looks round for help. He can't understand a word.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can someone tell me what the fuck this guy's trying to say... Chang calls over to the barman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you turn the music off. It won't be long, I promise. The music's killed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's better. Thank you very much... Chang pulls out Li Po's distinctive mobile phone. Dimitri, currently flanking Yuri, turns white. Chang calls a number. A beat. Then a phone starts ringing in Dimitri's jacket pocket (with a really cheesy ringtone). Dimitri winces. Chang shakes his head. Yuri pulls a gun. Kim shoots him dead. Chang moves his gun across to Dimitri. Holds his mobile phone up to his ear. Dimitri answers. Chang speaks through the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're under arrest...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on Dimitri as he stares at Chang, a rabbit in the headlights. Chang slowly sits down next to him. Talks to him in English.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need information. Phaiban spins a spotlight onto Dimitri.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you're going to help me. Suddenly the atmosphere in the emptied club shifts. It's as if Dimitri and Chang are locked into some kind of surreal performance...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whether you like it or not. Dimitri's body starts to shake in fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was an English woman - she wanted you dead... A beat. Not what Chang expected...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Said you... murdered her son....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who was she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did she know me? Dimitri shakes his head. He really doesn't know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She asked for you by name...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what's my name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang starts to circle him. Dimitri's terrified. Doesn't know what the fuck he's on about. Suddenly he's grabbed from behind by Phaiban. Chang smashes a beer bottle and walks up behind Dimitri...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see the way you look at my people. The way you abuse them with your eyes. For this, I take your sight. He pushes the broken bottle into Dimitri's eyes. Gauges them out. Dimitri screams hysterically - calling out for his mother in Russian...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You live in my country, but you fail to learn our language. You don't even try. For this I take your tongue... Phaibun grabs Dimitri's head from behind. Chang presses down on his stomach with his knee and opens his mouth - grabs hold of his tongue and with a blade slowly cuts it off. ...Dimitri's screams become more like the howls of a dying animal... Chang looks at him and his men release Dimitri who stumbles around the room like a chicken without a head...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You had opportunities. You could have chosen other paths... But you wouldn't listen... For this I give you silence... Chang grabs Dimitri and pushes the knife into his ear. First one side, then the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . We can't hear Dimitri's screaming. We can't hear anything at all. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Painful and beautiful, but also tacky... The opening bars to one of Dolly Parton's classics. Karaoke style.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) If I should stay, I would only be in your way. So I'll go, but I know I'll think of you every step of the way. And Chang with his crew just stare at the tortured Russian as he screams until his lungs are ready to burst.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nadee and Chang on stage. Singing their hearts out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I will always love you. I will always love you. You, my darling you. Hmm. His crew watch, emotion etched on their faces...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon is sitting on a chair in Jenna's hotel room, a whiskey in his hand, the Bangkok skyline behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Bittersweet memories that is all I'm taking with me. So, goodbye. Please don't cry, Jenna walks in from the bedroom wearing her dressing gown and walks over to him - a commanding presence. He makes to get up but she pushes him down and then leans down and kisses him hard on the mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) We both know that I'm not what you, you need.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nadee and Chang continue singing - a spotlight beaming down on them, singling them out in the shadowy bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I will always love you. I will always love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenna and Gordon are still kissing as the guitar solo of the instrumental section kicks in...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Chang waits for the instrumental section to end, he starts to cry, letting the tears flow without embarrassment. Nadee puts her arm around him to comfort him. The rest of the crew start crying as well, Daeng in particular.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope life treats you kind And I hope you have all you've dreamed of... And I wish you, joy and happiness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But above all this, I wish you love. And I will always love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian trains alone in the night...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I will always love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I will always love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KARAOKE BAR- NIGHT Nadee and Chang holding hands...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I will always love you. I will always love you...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will always love you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Julian stares at his reflection.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) You, darling, I love you. Ooh, I'll always, I'll always love you. Julian lifts his fists up. The same fighting pose we saw him in at the very beginning. He's ready. Ready as he'll ever be.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two figures kneel on either side of the ring. Julian and Chang. Both wearing Mongkol. Totally still. The ceremonial music begins... Slowly Julian and Chang start to perform Ram Muay, the ancient, traditional dance which the rules of the game say must be carried out before a fight takes place. It is both strange and spiritual: Julian and Chang move their arms rhythmically, in time to the music, their hands describing shapes and outlining fighting positions. As the dance develops, so their positions become more combative; now crouching, now standing, hinting at the kicks and punches that they're about to perform... but all carried out with an almost beatific precision that is at odds with the violence that is about to follow...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Music Ends. A moment of stillness, and then slowly we bring up the SOUND of the baying crowd. Chanting. Screaming. Wild excitement. Ready for the fight they've all been waiting for...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The crowd is packed. In one corner: Julian. Charlie Ling beside him along with Ko Sam. He looks focussed. Confident. In the other corner: Chang. Kim next to him along with a couple of his crew. He looks incredibly calm. The first bell sounds. Five second warning... Chang looks over into the crowd. Kanita with Nadee. Kanita offers him a 'thumbs up'. Chang smiles. Returns it. Julian looks over. Sees Mai take a seat. She holds his gaze. The second bell sounds. The first of five rounds. Julian and Chang walk up to the centre of the ring. The Referee stands between them. Brings them together. A quick look down to the Three Judges. Then a look between the two fighters. Julian eyes Chang. Steely determination in his eyes. Chang looks back at him without emotion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fight. Julian and Chang circle each other. Julian moves in to attack first. He throws a straight left first to Chang's face and steps his left foot forward at the same time. Chang bends his right leg, dodging the attack. He then pounces on the upper part of Julian's arm with his right hand and catches his wrist with his left hand. He tries to turn Julian's front wrist up, but Julian's too strong. This is a surprise for Chang. He breaks and steps back. Julian moves in to attack again, raising both elbows to make an attack on Chang's head. Chang steps forward and pulls an uppercut, connecting hard with Julian's chin. Julian moves back, dazed. Takes a moment to get his bearings back. That hurt. Chang doesn't take the opportunity to attack. He hangs back. Waiting for Julian to come at him again. This pisses Julian off. He moves forward and throws an offensive kick with his right foot. Chang moves back to dodge the attack and swivels to try and strike with a counter attack. He moves too slow. The right footed attack was a feint. Julian slams his right foot down on the floor and uses it to swivel, unleashing a kick with his left which connects with Chang's jaw and sends him flying back. Julian uses his forward motion to propel him onwards. He bounds over to the disoriented Chang and hits him with a series of jabs and punches to his upper body and face. Chang's almost on the ropes. Julian comes in hard with kicks to the shins with his right foot. Chang bends his body to pass under Julian's right foot. Julian misses the target. Chang manages to place his right foot on Julian's left knee-joint which makes him fall down. Julian's in a vulnerable position, but Chang doesn't move to make the killer blow. He steps back to let him recover. Again this enrages Julian. He gets up and moves forward towards Chang. He comes in with a high right kick. Again Chang manages to dodge the attack and returns with a right foot to the back of Julian's left knee. Julian swivels, punches air, and gets a trio of punches in his gut. His guard's down. But again no killer punch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Chang retreats. Shrugs at Julian. You come on. Julian moves towards him, but before he gets a chance to take out his frustrations, the bell goes. End of round one. Julian stalks back to his corner. He turns to look at Chang, a look of intense anger and frustration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian moves towards the middle where Chang is already waiting. Julian waits for Chang this time. Chang is reluctant to attack. A waiting game... Who will strike first... Chang wins. Julian moves to kick Chang in the ribs, keeping both his hands down as he moves in. Chang predicts this and prepares to throw his own kick as it comes in. Chang steps back, but again Julian swivels, using his right foot instead to pivot and unleashes a killer strike with his left foot. Chang goes flying backwards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the look of concern etched on the faces of Nadee and Kanita. Chang recovers but Julian moves in fast with a series of punches and elbows. Chang's on the ropes now and getting badly beaten. He clings on to Julian to limit the damage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Break. The two fighters step back from each other. Chang's face is damaged. Juilan's about to get stuck into him again when the bell sounds. End of the second round. Round three: Julian slamming punches into Chang. Nadee comforting Kanita. Telling her it'll be okay. Chang responding with kicks and elbows. Defensive blocks and counter attacks. Mai willing Julian on. Jenna watching with Gordon... End of round: Julian feeling more confident. Again his eyes scan the crowd. This time he sees what he's looking for: Jenna. Chang eyeballs Julian from the other corner. Sees him staring into the crowd. Looks over. Tries to see what he's looking at but can't make it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from Chang as he sees Jenna make her way toward Julian. When she gets to him we see her saying something to Julian about the fight - urging him to hit harder... Jenna then walks back to Gordon... On Chang. Deep in thought. He gets up early. Walks around the ring. Looking into the crowd. Jenna sees him. Stares at him. Suddenly nervous. Everything slows down as Chang clocks her again. The colours of the room change from blue to yellow to red. He's seen her and she knows she's been seen. And he knows. And she knows that he knows... The bell goes off. Back to reality. Chang turns round. Too late. He gets a massive blow to his head. He goes down hard. The Referee starts counting. Nadee and Kanita watch on, fearful. Jenna holds her breath. Hopeful that he might be down and out. Kim watches on, concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get up. Please get up. After a long, terrible pause... Chang gets up. He looks over into the crowd. Makes eye contact with his wife. It's okay. She shakes her head. She can't bear it. Tears running down her face. Back on his feet, Chang suddenly drops his guard. Julian hesitates, confused. Chang leans in close to him. Winks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wasn't you, was it? Julian shrugs, puts his guard up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're innocent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not your fault. Chang raises his arms again. Ready to fight. Julian gets ready to attack but something's changed. The fire's gone out of him. He looks over to his mother, to Mai, Chang's words echoing in his mind. It's not his fault. Then Chang comes in with a flurry of punches. Left, right, left, right. Julian just takes them... Chang pauses in the onslaught. Julian stays motionless in the middle of the ring. Chang runs at him, flings his right foot, swivels, pulling out a roundhouse left kick - - which makes contact with Julian's draw.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as Julian's head takes the impact. He's out cold before he hits the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenna hurries down the corridor. She reaches the dressing room door. She's about to knock but she stops. She opens the door silently and lets herself in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian's sitting on the treatment table, his face covered in cuts and bruises... Jenna watches him in silence from the shadows, steadies her breathing and then slips back out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenna comes out of the changing rooms as Mai approaches. Jenna shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't want to see anyone. Mai is disappointed. Doesn't know what to say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just give him time...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...tell him I came?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course. Jenna hugs Mai close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll get him through this together.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian turns when he hears a knock at the door. Says nothing. Jenna enters and closes the door behind her. She stands there for a moment as if considering what to say...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You deserved to win. You should've
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give it a break mum. Just... give it as rest. He steps into the light. She reaches out to touch him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll never get use to seeing you get hurt - even when you win.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well I lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And did it make a difference? Julian says nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to know... Did it make a difference? Slowly he shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... No... it didn't make a difference... No difference at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how do you feel now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. I don't feel anything at all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you see, that's how I felt when Billy died... Julian studies his mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want, Mum? Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What d'you think I want? I want it to be like it used to be... I don't want to lose you... Jenna starts crying. Could be real, could be an act - hard to tell she's so good...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong Mum? She shakes her head. Can't say it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He knows... He knows it was me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who does? Beat. Jenna says nothing. Julian thinks... Cogs turn...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang? Jenna nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you do, Mum? What did you do? Jenna makes her hand into a pistol. Pretends to fire it into her skull. She tried to have Chang killed. Julian's speechless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's going to come after me. And after he's come after me, he's going to come after you. Julian stares at his mother; fragile, terrified, alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm scared, Julian. Julian stares at his mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are we going to do? Julian begins to realize what he has to do... and he looks at his hands. Finally...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll be okay - I'll do it, I'll take him out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not just him. We've got to take them all out. Julian stares at her - the power she has over him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill them all. The final solution.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang, Nadee and Kanita are having a nice dinner - happy that Chang won and enjoying each other's company in silence...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang tucks in his daughter. Nadee watches from the doorway. Kanita still has some dolls on her bed. He starts taking them off. Notices one of them is broken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to the princess' head?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The monsters were angry. They bit it off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought the King banished them all from his kingdom?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These were new monsters. The woods are full of them. Chang holds the broken princess' body. A sudden wave of fear washes over him. A sense of doom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong Dad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing's wrong. Go to sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang speaks on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're going to come after me... Okay. Good. He ends the call. Stares at his reflection in the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang gets into bed next to his wife. Switches off the light. The two of them are bathed in moonlight. He holds his wife's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's still early - the sun is only just starting to rise over he city. Charlie Ling's driving, Ko Sam beside him. Julian's in the back street. His face is a mask, his eyes hidden by his sunglasses... next to him is a silver shining motorcycle helmet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CHANG'S APARTMENT / KITCHEN - DAY Chang is eating breakfast as he watches a western on TV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nadee and Kanita walk through the various stalls buying groceries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang is dressed - finishing putting on his tie - ready for the day. He walks into his sitting room as he hears his mobile ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is in her room...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You sure it's her?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good... see you very soon. ...and Chang hangs up... The Angel of Vengeance getting ready to strike again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang steps out of his apartment into the hallway where a uniformed policeman sits on guard reading a Manga comic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Li Hom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen Li Hom. You see anyone you don't like... You call me, okay? Li Hom nods. Chang leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And by the way... Chang turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (IN THAI) Congratulations. Last night. Everyone in the station's talking about it. Chang nods. Leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The car's parked outside Gordon's apartment block. Gordon's not shown. Julian's calling him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Sorry mate, something's come up. Julian pauses. Can't believe it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you here. Right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I know but... I'm busy. What I'm doing, it's important. I'm sorry mate. Julian's incredibly frustrated but hasn't got time to argue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Julian kills his phone. He's still for a moment, then:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's make a move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang and the Cops walk into the hotel. Chang heads for the elevators while Kim approaches reception. Chang calls the lift and waits. Kim comes back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They wont disturb us. Chang nods. The elevator door opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What floor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Top.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang and the Cops are standing in the elevator waiting to get off. Elevator music plays...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian is walking around Chang's apartment... looking at all family pictures... getting a sense of how they live. He opens drawers and closets and studies all the photos of Chang as a boxer and soldier. ...on a wall is a framed article in Thai that Charlie Ling is reading.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's it say? Charlie starts reading the article out:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Boxing Cop Hero Back From Grave". One of Bangkok's finest, blah blah blah, came out of a coma that lasted for an entire year, waking up as if nothing had happened... Wife was really happy, blah blah blah... "It's hard to describe" Chang said, "but I do feel different." Charlie starts to sneer as he reads. Julian is listening intently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "I experienced something metaphysical, impossible to explain... I travelled to many places and saw many things... And when I woke up I was no longer the man I once was..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Angel Of Vengeance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nadee and Kanita come out of the elevator and Nadee quickly sees that police guard from before has been replaced by someone else (Ko Sam)... Ko Sam smiles...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm the new guard. Please, go on in. Nadee looks at him suspiciously but enters the apartment with Kanita. Ko Sam pretends to go back to reading his Manga comic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenna sips tea from a China cup. She puts it back down on to her saucer. Kim is sitting opposite her. Chang stands in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I came here to collect my son's body. Now it's released, my business in Bangkok is completed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When are you leaving?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And your other son - is he going with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've had no real contact with Julian since he ran away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You watched him fight. Jenna looks over to Chang.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I watched him lose. And he deserved to. You were the better fighter. My only sadness is that Billy got caught up in what he's doing out here. And paid for it with his life. Kim and the rest of the crew take this in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll never testify against my own flesh and blood, Officer Chang. But he's a killer. Chang senses something. Starts to become agitated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... It pains me to say it, but my own son is a killer. He killed a cop back in England ten years ago. He's been on the run ever since. I say son... But he hasn't been a son to me. Chang stares at the door to the bedroom. Feels the presence of someone the other side of the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not for a long time. Not since he killed that cop back home... That was ten years ago. He's been running ever since. And he'll never stop until he's caught. Until you catch him. Chang starts to push the door open... Behind him Jenna stands up. Before Chang fully opens the door, his mobile phone rings. It sounds INCREDIBLY loud. He takes it out and looks at the display with a feeling of dread. He answers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (IN THAI) It's me... Did you change the guard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nadee is in the kitchen putting away the groceries as she is speaking with Chang...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (IN THAI) No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone else is out there now...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang begins to panic. His eyes fall upon Jenna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out of the apartment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nadee hear's Kanita call for her from the living room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold on...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang screams down the phone:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: GET OUT OF THE APARTMENT!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... But Nadee is holding the phone against her chest and can't hear Chang as she walks into the living room...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... where Julian is sitting on the couch wearing the motorcycle helmet, a shotgun on his lap. Kanita is standing in the middle of the room, staring at Julian. Charlie Ling leans against the opposite wall, a pistol in his hand. Nadee remains silent, trying to think fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang listens to the phone, knowing something's wrong. Jenna stares at him, defiant. Their eyes lock briefly. But Chang hasn't got time for this. He barges past her and out of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CAMERA TRACKS with Chang as he runs down the corridor in total desperation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CAMERA ZOOMS towards the main door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON Nadee who stares at the main door then slowly turns back to Julian. She knows they're trapped. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kanita - go to your room. But Kanita stands still - fear in her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... go to your room now. And slowly Kanita walks towards her room as Charlie Ling watches her... Kanita closes the door. Beat - silence... Julian stands up and walks toward Nadee - raises his shotgun and blows her head off. Blood spatters onto the wall, bits of brain and skull everywhere as her body falls to the ground...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang stops in his tracks. It's as if he can feel the shotgun blast in his heart. He knows what's just happened... He stands still. He closes his eyes as if he had only to wish to make it all go away... He opens them again to see... The street is completely deserted. Chang stands alone in the middle of a ghost town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian takes off his helmet that's covered in blood, throws it onto the floor and walks toward the front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait... Julian turns back. Charlie Ling nods towards Kanita's room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The kid. Julian shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who said? Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother? Charlie Ling nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of a mother says that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you've got a problem, talk to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. We're not doing it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't have to. I will. Charlie Ling kicks open the door. Julian realises he can't let him do it. And as Charlie Ling sees Kanita... Julian shoots him in the back. Charlie Ling slumps to the floor. Julian approaches the doorway. He looks in. Sees Kanita sitting on her bed. She stares at Julian, Charlie Ling's dead body at his feet. They hold each other's gaze... and then Julian slowly bows his head and leaves...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian walks out of the apartment with the shotgun raised, expecting to shoot Ko Sam... But the hallway is empty...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian stumbles out of the apartment, desperately catching his breath. He ends up leaning on a stall - similar to the one he knocked over outside Choi Yan Lee's kiosk. Candles and incense. Buddha's smiling back at him... Julian looks around him and again everything seems intense and incredibly vibrant... A group of school children, all of whom are Downs Syndrome, are crossing the road. Smiles plastered across their faces... Julian stares at them... Their presence seems to have a calming effect on him, as if they're giving him new energy to do what he's starting to realize he has to do next.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang stares at the body of his dead wife. Perfectly still. His crew in the background...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian walks across towards the lift, the shotgun hidden inside his shirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lift music. Julian stands perfectly still in the lift as it goes up... Just like Chang did before...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Julian walks down the corridor he takes the shotgun out - holds it out in front of him as if it were a sacred weapon... He reaches the door to his mother's room and pauses. Julian stares at the door as if it was heaven's gate... He loads the shotgun with two fresh cartridges.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only God forgives. And now mother - you will die... He rings the bell, raising the shotgun, ready to shoot. The door
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - but it's Gordon who opens it, dressed in a bathrobe. Confused, Julian continues to level the weapon at his head. Gordon backs away into the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Easy... Julian says nothing. Edges into the room. The gun still pointed at Gordon's head. Julian says nothing. Kicks the door closed with his foot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's gone... Picked up Billy's body... She's gone home. Finally Julian lowers the shotgun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't she tell you? Julian sits down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You alright mate? D'you want something? Julian mumbles to himself... then turns to Gordon. Realisation dawning on him:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so fucked...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kanita sits in a chair, her father standing behind her. Very formal. Kim is showing her various head shots of criminals... Kanita shakes her head until Chang puts down a picture of Julian. She looks up at her father - nods...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenna gazes out of the window. She takes out her compact and adjusts her make up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenna's taxi heads over the Mega Bridge, taking her away towards the airport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon and Julian walk towards Gordon's car, the sounds of their footsteps ricocheting off the concrete walls. Reaching the car, Gordon stands by the driver's door as Julian heads for the passenger's side. Gordon pauses before unlocking the door. Looks over to Julian, talking across the roof of the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're good mates aren't we? Beat. Julian's instantly suspicious...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry about this Julian. I wish there was another way... Gordon levels a pistol at Julian's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did she say? What did she promise you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't make this harder--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A bullet RIPS through Julian's shoulder. He falls back on the car behind him setting off a chorus of car alarms. Gordon starts to walk round to deliver the killer blow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've become a liability. You can see that, can't you? Julian looks at the wound. It's deep but he's not totally incapacitated. He pulls the shotgun out from under his shirt. It clatters to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And now she wants me to take over. She wants me to be the favoured son. What am I supposed to say? Julian sinks to his knees, leaning over to pick up the shotgun. He's got seconds...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't want it to end like this. First I fuck your mother. Then I-- Gordon turns the corner - but Julian's in position. Two shots in quick succession. Both barrels fired at Gordon's chest. The force of the explosion FLINGS Gordon's body against the far wall of the car park. Dead instantly. Julian pulls himself up and stands there, the smoking shotgun acting as a makeshift crutch. He gazes at Gordon's steaming corpse, appalled by the turn of events...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian falls out into a side street. He's badly wounded but he's going to make it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian takes the top off a vodka bottle with his teeth. He pours the spirit over his wound. It stings like hell and Julian screams in agony.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian walks out into the night, the neon glow turning the streets into a modern day Hades.... Although the wound isn't life threatening, Julian's face is pale from the loss of blood. He looks like a ghost. He sees two cops chatting on a street corner. They don't see him, they're not even looking for him, but they remind him. Chang. It's just a matter of time... Julian keeps walking. Wipes sweat from his face. Looking for a place to hide. A hole in the ground. Anything. Then suddenly it comes to him. A single idea. A possible way of escape...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A series of napkins are rolled and placed in a steadily growing pile. The work is being carried out by Mai who has a lowly position in a massive and sterile industrial kitchen. Not the sort of life she planed on having... A Co-Worker calls out to her...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mai. Some guy's out there asking for you. Mai finishes the last napkin and places it on the pile. She walks towards the exit, passing her Co-Worker...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't forget it's supposed to be my break next.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mai comes from round a corner and sees Julian leaning against the wall. She checks that they're alone, knowing instinctively that he's in trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to you? Beat. Julian almost smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to get out of Bangkok. Didn't want to leave... He winces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... without saying goodbye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who did this to you? A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother... She made me what I am. And now I've got nothing. And they're after me. Mai stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come with me... Julian looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...to Cambodia - we can hide there... You'll be safe there. Mai and Julian smile at each other. It's sweet. Innocent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got about twelve grand at the club... Should be enough to get us there. Set ourselves up. Disappear...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right now. Mai looks around - they're alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait outside...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian watches as Mai comes into the Restaurant from the kitchen and walks over to the bar area... Making sure no one's watching, Mai starts to pull money out of the til... Julian looks over at the shop front next to him... A Travel Agency. Pictures of holidays and beaches. Paradise. It all seems in his grasp. Mai comes up to him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mai and Julian are in the Taxi. He puts his arm around her. They're on their way...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The taxi pulls up outside Juilan's club.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian gets out of the taxi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay here. If I'm not out in five minutes... Go. Mai nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five minutes. Julian nods and slams the door shut. Mai watches Juilan disappear into the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We PAN THROUGH Julian's empty club. It's silent and empty like a tomb... We PICK UP Julian as he hurries through towards his office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back where we first met him... Julian flings open the door to his safe and starts pulling wads of money into a canvas hold all. He's about to leave when he notices someone standing in the shadows behind him. Slowly, out of the darkness, a series of figures appear like vampires... Chang and the Cops. Impossible to say how long they've been standing there... Chang and Julian stare at each other...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go. We TRACK IN to a CLOSE SHOT on Julian. It's almost as if this moment was inevitable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang brings Julian out of the club. A police car is waiting outside. Mai sits in the back seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The police car drives through the city streets and onto the freeway heading out of town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daeng is driving. Kim sits next to him. Daeng looks into the rearview mirror to see-- Julian and Mai sitting next to Chang. Mai looks scared... Julian more accepting of his fate...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Police Car heads over the Mega Bridge and continues its way out of town.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They all sit in the car in silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Police Car pulls up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang leads Juilan across the field. The Cops follow a few steps behind with Mai. Suddenly, and completely unexpectedly, Chang punches Julian in the gut... Julian falls to the floor and Chang starts to viciously attack him, punching and kicking him. Finally Julian, unable to defend himself, is lying on the ground, immobile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get up. Julian rolls over. Eyes Chang. Slowly he starts to get up onto his knees. They continue, Chang forcing Julian to crawl as they make their way further into the field. Then Chang stops...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get up. Now. Julian struggles to get up to his feet, but before he does, Chang kicks him hard in the chest, sending him back down to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have anything to say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't hurt her. He kicks him in the stomach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have anything to say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry... Chang kicks him again - like you would kick a dog... Juilan groans. Chang squats down next to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you expect me to do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... I'm sorry. Chang gets up and walks on. He stops and turns round.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Julian stumbles to his feet. The party continue. We see that one of the crew is carrying an axe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A couple of wild dogs watch as our group reach a high point. Chang looks down at Julian who is lying on the ground. The crew stand in the background with Mai. Chang sits next to Julian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you were born - what's the first thing you remember seeing? A beat as Julian struggles to understand Chang's question... Chang stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you remember? Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dark... Darkness. Chang looks at him in a strange way - like this answer has some meaning for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And do you ever see light? Julian shakes he's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No... Never. Chang considers this answer for a long moment. He gets up and returns to Mai - stares at her....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am the Angel of Vengeance... I restore order and karma. I love all living things... Mai just stares at him - too frightened to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...I want you to walk away from here now... Do you understand? Mai nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Chang smiles at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go with God. Mai turns and leaves. Chang watches her disappear into the field. Chang takes the axe off Phaiban and turns back to Julian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mai walks through the field, alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang leans down next to Julian and whispers something into Julian's ear - so softly that we cannot hear it. Whatever it says it instantly has an effect on Julian. He visibly relaxes. He doesn't make a sound as he's held down. A plastic strap is tied around his arm as a tourniquet. His arm is pulled out. Chang swings the axe and chops off first his left hand and then his right. Julian grits his teeth throughout. Doesn't scream. Chang picks up the severed hands and throws them to the wild dogs. The dogs tear into the meat, fighting over their prize.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang and his men walk back towards the car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: once again... the Karaoke version of John Denver's country and western ballad...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Almost heaven, West Virginia Blue ridge mountains Shenandoah river - Life is old there Older than the trees Younger than the mountains Growin' like the breeze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see various scenes of every day life in Bangkok.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Country roads, take me home To the place I belong West Virginia, mountain momma Take me home, country roads
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see kids waiting outside the school for their parents to pick them up. Kanita spots Chang, runs towards him and they embrace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) All my memories gathered round her Miners lady, stranger to blue water Dark and dusty, painted on the sky Misty taste of moonshine Teardrops in my eye. Chang and Kanita disappear into a crowd of policemen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chang is in his element. Singing like a cowboy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Country roads, take me home to the place I belong West Virginia, mountain momma Take me home, country roads.. The Cops sit and watch him. Their leader... Their God...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Julian is lying in hospital. Bandages covering the terrible wounds where his hands once were. Mai is sitting beside him. Spoon feeding him food.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) I hear my voice In the mornin' hour she calls me The radio reminds me of my home far away And drivin' down the road I get a feelin' That I should have been home yesterday,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An aeroplane lands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Country roads, take me home To the place I belong
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jenna is in the process of being strip searched by the authorities. Zero dignity.
direction.name: direction
